trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> property along a set of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*>.
trans-unit.target: Anima o valor de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> propriedade ao longo de um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*>

trans-unit.source: A key frame animation's target values are defined by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> property, which contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame> objects.
trans-unit.target: Valores de destino de uma animação quadro-chave são definidos por seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>propriedade, que contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame> defines a segment of the animation with its own target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame.Value%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>define um segmento da animação com seu próprio destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame.Value%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.
trans-unit.target: Quando a animação é executada, ela avança de um valor de chave para a próxima no local especificado da chave vezes.

trans-unit.source: There are three types of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame> classes, one for each supported interpolation method: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVector3DKeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteVector3DKeyFrame>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineVector3DKeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: Há três tipos de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>classes, uma para cada método de interpolação com suporte: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVector3DKeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteVector3DKeyFrame>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineVector3DKeyFrame>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineVector3DKeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteVector3DKeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVector3DKeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimation>, a Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames can have more than two of target values.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimation>, um Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames pode ter mais de dois valores de destino.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimation>

trans-unit.source: You can also control the interpolation method of individual <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame> segments.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode controlar o método de interpolação do indivíduo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>segmentos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um filho <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame"> </xref> a este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method allows <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame> objects to be direct children of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object in markup.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>objetos sejam filhos direcionam de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames>objeto na marcação.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: The object to be added as the child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser adicionado como filho deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parameter child is not a .
trans-unit.target: The parameter child is not a .

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string as a child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma cadeia de caracteres de texto como um filho deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an `InvalididOperationException` unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames>não aceita texto como um filho, para que esse método gerará uma `InvalididOperationException` , a menos que uma classe derivada substituiu esse comportamento que permite que o texto a ser adicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: The text added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto adicionado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise this exception unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> não aceita texto como um filho, para que esse método gerará esta exceção, a menos que uma classe derivada substituiu esse comportamento que permite que o texto a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a modifiable clone of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um clone modificável desta instância.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: O método de clonagem é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationBase.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to provide a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a herdadas <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationBase.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para fornecer uma implementação fortemente tipada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationBase.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável desta instância.

trans-unit.source: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object, although some copying might be deferred until necessary for improved performance.
trans-unit.target: O clone retornado é efetivamente uma cópia em profundidade do objeto atual, embora alguns copiando pode ser adiada até que o necessário para melhorar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The copy's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cópia <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*>

trans-unit.source: Makes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the current object using base (non-animated, non-databound) property values.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que o especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> um clone modificável (cópia em profundidade) do objeto atual usando a propriedade base (não animado não-ligação de dados) de valores.

trans-unit.source: Destination for the modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Destino para o clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be false even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was true.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> será false mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> propriedade era true.

trans-unit.source: Makes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the current object using current property values.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que o especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> um clone modificável (cópia em profundidade) do objeto atual usando os valores da propriedade atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> to be cloned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> a ser clonado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable..
trans-unit.target: Faz com que esta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> do objeto não modificável ou determina se ele pode ser feito não modificável.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to check if this instance can be frozen; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to freeze this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para verificar se esta instância pode ser congelada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> congelar esta instância.

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is true, this method returns if this instance can be made read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only.
trans-unit.target: Se isChecking for true, este método retorna se esta instância pode se tornar somente leitura, ou se ele não pode se tornar somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is false, this method returns if this instance is now read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
trans-unit.target: Se isChecking for falsa, este método retorna se esta instância agora é somente leitura, ou se ele não pode tornar somente para leitura, com o efeito colateral de ter iniciado alterar o status de congelamento deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Isso torna a instância um clone do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object to be cloned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> objeto a ser clonado.

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a copy of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isso torna a instância de uma cópia do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> to copy and freeze
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> para copiar e congelar

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Calcula um valor que representa o valor atual da propriedade que está sendo animada, conforme determinado por esta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o `defaultOriginValue` é o primeiro na cadeia de composição, esse valor será o valor de instantâneo (se estiver disponível) ou o valor da propriedade base; caso contrário, esse valor será o valor retornado pela animação anterior na cadeia com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>que não é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: O `defaultDestinationValue` é o valor de base se a animação for a primeira camada de composição de animações em uma propriedade; caso contrário, o valor é o valor de saída da camada de composição anterior de animações para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de origem sugerido, usado se a animação não tiver definido sua própria explicitamente valor inicial.

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de destino sugerido, usado se a animação não tiver definido sua própria explicitamente terminar de valor.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> that generates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress*> used by the host animation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref> que gera a <> </> *> ou <> </> *> usado pela animação host.

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O valor calculado da propriedade, conforme determinado pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Provide a custom natural <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> when the <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>.
trans-unit.target: Forneça uma ordenação personalizada <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"> </xref> quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"> </xref> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> whose natural duration is desired.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> cuja duração natural é desejada.

trans-unit.source: If the last key frame of this animation is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime"></xref>, then this value is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration*>; otherwise it will be one second.
trans-unit.target: Se for o último quadro chave dessa animação um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime"> </xref>, em seguida, esse valor é usado como o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration*>; caso contrário, será um segundo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the animation's output value is added to the base value of the property being animated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o valor de saída da animação é adicionado ao valor base da propriedade que está sendo animada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the animation adds its output value to the base value of the property being animated instead of replacing it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a animação adiciona o valor de saída para o valor base da propriedade que está sendo animada em vez de substituí-los. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o valor da animação acumula quando ela se repete.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa propriedade é definida como `true`, a saída da animação valores acumulam somente quando a animação <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>propriedade faz com que ele Repita sua duração simples.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Ele não se acumulam seus valores quando ele for reiniciado, pois seu pai é repetido ou porque seu relógio foi reiniciado a partir um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>chame.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the animation accumulates its values when its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> property causes it to repeat its simple duration; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a animação acumula seus valores ao seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>propriedade faz com que ele Repita sua duração simples; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame"></xref> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame"> </xref> objetos que definem a animação.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame"></xref> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrame"> </xref> objetos que definem a animação.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrameCollection.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrameCollection.Empty*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DKeyFrameCollection.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Called when the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object is modified.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> objeto é modificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*> property of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> should be value-serialized.
trans-unit.target: Retornará true se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*>propriedade desta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> deve ser serializado por valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Vector3DAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da propriedade deve ser serializado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto filho.

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filho para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o conteúdo de texto de um nó para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser adicionado ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an ordered collection P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames associated with this animation sequence.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma coleção ordenada que p:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.keyframes associado a esta sequência de animação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames*>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames*></xref:System.Collections.IList>
